text: Francisco Álvares de Assis Airport , popularly called Serrinha Airport, is an airport in Juiz de Fora, Brazil. It is operated by Sinart. ==History== The airport was inaugurated in 1958 and since 2007 it is operated by Sinart. The aviation club of Juiz de Fora is based at the airport. On 2 April 2014 the airport ceased to receive commercial flights. All flights were transferred to the new and larger Pres. Itamar Franco Airport located from downtown Juiz de Fora. ==Airlines and destinations== ==Access== The airport is located from the centre of Juiz de Fora. ==See also== *List of airports in Brazil ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:Airports in Minas Gerais Category:Airports established in 1958 Category:Juiz de Fora
title: Juiz de Fora Airport
